Html:
I just upgraded to Silverlight 5, and http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php is broken for me.  I was wondering if there was plans to upgrade it from SL 4 to 5 seeing that people will be upgrading soon to it (or already have).  I like the Silverlight version better than the WPF one due to auto-updates, and I hope to use it soon without having to uninstall SL 5.

Thanks for all your hard work!

We don't have any immediate plans to upgrade. SL4 applications should still work under SL5, but there seem to be some problems experienced by some users. Unfortunately, there doesn't seem to be any clear solution to this. Check http://forums.silverlight.net/t/249746.aspx/1?SL5+browser+plugin+problem+with+SL4+apps for more details.

Ok, because right now I'm using both Chrome and IE 9 x32, and when i load the rawr.php from EJ, all I get is a blank screen.

I'll keep looking around to fix it on my machine, or keep using the WPF version.
